game.name: ERA ONE
game.shortDescription: Era One is an innovative space game that combines elements of real-time strategy, base building, space survival, and tactical battles. Players can create and customize their bases from scratch, construct various types of structures and warships, manage fleets, and engage in tactical space battles.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Era One is an innovative space game that combines elements of real-time strategy, base building, space survival, and tactical battles. Players can create and customize their bases from scratch, construct various types of structures and warships, manage fleets, and engage in tactical space battles.

reviewHighlights.text: KOREAN PLZ 지금 컨텐츠 봇하고 싸우는거밖에 추가안됐음. 실시간인데 함선꾸미면서 상대랑 싸우는게임은 처음이라 재밌게했는데 빨리 컨텐츠 추가해야할듯. ui가 많이 불친절해서 이런장르가 처음인 분들한테는 비추천 나중에 멀티플레이 생기고 2대2 생기고하면 재밌을거같은...
매우 재미있음. 다만 한글화가 안되어 있음. 기지나 우주선 만드는 블럭이 더욱 많았으면...
